answerText: Ludvig Holberg, Baron of Holberg [or Lewis Holberg][10] Holberg's mock epic Peder Paars parodied this poem by Virgil, whose title character uses a golden bough to enter the underworld and causes Dido to kill herself when he leaves Carthage.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | RPI | 6 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man's only novel is a satirical work of science fiction whose protagonist visits the societies of Quama and Potu after he falls through a warm cave into outer space. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author of Niels Klim's Underground Travels and such comedic plays as Gert Westphaler and The Comedic Thinker. He is universally regarded as the father of Norwegian literature.
